articles.description: The New York Jets' defensive performance on Thursday Night Football unlocked a formula that could lead to sustained success.
articles.content:
C.J. Stroud seems to bring out the best in the New York Jets’ defense.
The difference this year, though, is that the Jets’ performance was more unusual.

articles.title: Cam Newton goes all-in against Anthony Richardson after benching: ‘Get the f–k down’ - New York Post
